update.description:
It is currently generation only jobs for `Bionic/Melodic`but there is support in place for `Xenial/Kinetic`

The [jobs generated](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_subt/5) are:

* The -ci- to run on changes on default branch
* The -ci-pr\_any- to be used in the pull request
* The debbuilder for releases
* The -install- to test packages \(currently disabled\)

The compilation job includes a [smoke test](#!/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/new#Ljenkins-scripts/docker/lib/subt-compilation-base.bashT29) that runs the launch file during a few second to test for big big failures or problems in the startup.

Testing job:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=13)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/13) [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/1](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/1)3

    * ~~Failing because libgazebo\_server\_fixture is not in the Ubuntu package \(bug\)~~. Unstable because of a [cpp warning](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-ci-default-bionic-amd64/10/warnings22Result/new).
    

‌
